content.c_answer2: Karis Anderson plays the lead role of Tina Turner. And she is ably supported by a talented cast that includes Okezie Morro (Ike Turner), Mark Anderson (Phil Spector), Irene Myrtle Forrester (Gran Georgeanna (GG)).
content.name: Who plays Tina Turner in the musical?
content.question: Who plays Tina Turner in the musical?
